base_description: Red rectangular box with six white switches.
part_description: Six white switches numbered 1 to 6 on red box. Each switch is cube-shaped, evenly spaced in a horizontal row on the front face.
internal_interaction_description: Each switch can be toggled independently, likely connecting to an internal mechanism that changes the state of the object. The arrangement suggests a sequential or parallel interaction where each switch may control a separate function or part of the whole system.
external_interaction_description: The object interacts with users through the switches, allowing them to toggle functions on or off. It may connect to other devices or systems, serving as a control panel for external operations, indicated by the 'ON' label.
